summary:
Experienced in humanitarian work in Africa - back to Africa in Jan 2022!
Managing responses to population movement, to epidemics (Measles, cholera, Ebola alerts, COVID-19 set up). 
Adaptations of all programming to COVID-19.  Led work on integration of Ebola and COVID-19 activities into the normal primary health care programme. 
 Programs include nutrition and WASH activities.
Worked for a year in the Netherlands on public health for COVID-19 pandemic.
Strengths in project development and implementation, coaching. Keeping an overview of programmes, taking into account the implications of the security situation in each area. Preparing and managing budgets. M&E. 
Linking longer term interventions in health facilities to activities in the community.
